video.title: Numb3rs
video.synopsis: In this crime drama, two brothers -- veteran FBI agent Don Eppes and genius mathematician Charlie Eppes -- pool their divergent skills to crack cases.

episodes.synopsis: Don races to capture a serial rapist who has begun to murder his victims. Charlie is recruited by Don to help track the killer.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: After a series of bank robberies, Don recruits Charlie to help chart the next robbery location, only to overlook the thieves' true motive.
episodes.title: Uncertainty Principle

episodes.synopsis: Don relies on Charlie's mathematical insight to help stop a virus that has been killing innocent people in Los Angeles.
episodes.title: Vector

episodes.synopsis: Charlie convinces Don to investigate a student's suicide in order to make sure that it was not murder.
episodes.title: Structural Corruption

episodes.synopsis: Don needs Charlie's help to find out why the daughter of a mathematician is kidnapped.
episodes.title: Prime Suspect

episodes.synopsis: While investigating a train accident, Don and Charlie discover a culprit who is on a mission to diminish public confidence in the railroad system.
episodes.title: Sabotage

episodes.synopsis: After two teens are found murdered, the investigation leads Don and his team to uncover a dangerous counterfeit money ring.
episodes.title: Counterfeit Reality

episodes.synopsis: When new information on an old case comes to light, Don thinks he may have sent the wrong person to jail.
episodes.title: Identity Crisis

episodes.synopsis: Don and his team must stop a sniper who goes on a killing spree in Los Angeles.
episodes.title: Sniper Zero

episodes.synopsis: Don must find the hijackers of a truck carrying nuclear waste before they detonate a dirty bomb in Los Angeles.
episodes.title: Dirty Bomb

episodes.synopsis: Don and his FBI team are called in to solve the murder of a computer researcher and are surprised with what they find.
episodes.title: Sacrifice

episodes.synopsis: When a UFO is spotted dangerously close to Los Angeles, Don recruits Charlie to help locate the mysterious aircraft's point of origin.
episodes.title: Noisy Edge

episodes.synopsis: Don must find two violent felons who escape after their prison bus is in a car accident.
episodes.title: Man Hunt

episodes.synopsis: Don uses Charlie and Megan's expertise when the FBI is called to the scene of a federal judge's wife's murder.
episodes.title: Judgment Call

episodes.synopsis: Don and his team must find who is responsible for kidnapping the family of a jewelry store owner before they are killed.
episodes.title: Better or Worse

episodes.synopsis: Don and his team search for the stalker of a pop princess which turns into a murder investigation of a paparazzo.
episodes.title: Obsession

episodes.synopsis: Don and his team must solve the murder of a CFO of a large energy corporation who is found murdered on her doorstep.
episodes.title: Calculated Risk

episodes.synopsis: Don and his team find a suspicious code during a raid which Charlie determines is part of a plan to assassinate a Colombian exile living in L.A.
episodes.title: Assassin

episodes.synopsis: Don and his agents must uncover who interfered with a counter-terrorism exercise before deadly results occur.
episodes.title: Soft Target

episodes.synopsis: When a father is killed in a home robbery, Don and his team investigate the connection between several recent robberies in the upscale community.
episodes.title: Convergence

episodes.synopsis: A routine drug bust unveils a sensitive issue which Charlie takes to heart.
episodes.title: In Plain Sight

episodes.synopsis: A former chemist of a large pharmaceutical company is discovered to be tampering with medication and Don and Megan must track him down.
episodes.title: Toxin

episodes.synopsis: The murder of a researcher leads the FBI on an investigation of a killer and a human skull.
episodes.title: Bones of Contention

episodes.synopsis: Don and his team must find the serial arsonist responsible for an innocent man's death.
episodes.title: Scorched

episodes.synopsis: When a fellow FBI agent working undercover is killed in a gang retaliation, Don and his team must investigate.
episodes.title: The O.G.

episodes.synopsis: A murder of a young student at a card club leads the FBI to uncover a deadly card counting scheme.
episodes.title: Double Down

episodes.synopsis: The agents must stop an organ trafficking ring when they discover a young immigrant girl died while selling one of her kidneys.
episodes.title: Harvest

episodes.synopsis: A Cal Sci science student becomes the suspect when an expensive piece of equipment is stolen from the school's DNA lab.
episodes.title: The Running Man

episodes.synopsis: An anti-war bombing that kills an innocent man becomes personal when the case reveals surprising information about Don and Charlie's father's past.
episodes.title: Protest

episodes.synopsis: When a psychic leads authorities to a deadly crime scene, Charlie sets out to prove it is just a fluke.
episodes.title: Mind Games

episodes.synopsis: The FBI investigates the murder of a female Iraqi activist which happened on U.S. soil.
episodes.title: All's Fair

episodes.synopsis: Don and his team investigate the motive behind two students' deadly school shooting.
episodes.title: Dark Matter

episodes.synopsis: When an ATF agent is found dead amid questionable circumstances, Don demands to take on the case, which revolves around an elaborate bank heist.
episodes.title: Guns and Roses

episodes.synopsis: After an unknown man opens fire in the FBI offices, Don and his team must investigate his motive and his connection to a dangerous arms dealer.
episodes.title: Rampage

episodes.synopsis: An FBI investigation into a computer hacking scam becomes personal for Don.
episodes.title: Backscatter

episodes.synopsis: Don puts a rush on the investigation of an outbreak of Avian flu, which takes a surprising turn when a clue is discovered on a victim's body.
episodes.title: Undercurrents

episodes.synopsis: The details surrounding a young woman's death suggests to Don and his team that she could have been murdered by a serial killer.
episodes.title: Hot Shot

episodes.synopsis: Don taps Charlie to assist with the case of a teacher's cross-country crime spree, but Charlie's conflict with Alan makes him lose focus.
episodes.title: Spree

episodes.synopsis: Dangerous fugitive Crystal takes a hostage and refuses to release her until the FBI promises to let Buck go free.
episodes.title: Two Daughters

episodes.synopsis: When Charlie delves into a stolen painting's past, he discovers that Nazis captured the priceless artwork during the Holocaust.
episodes.title: Provenance

episodes.synopsis: When Charlie analyzes the death of a Chinese interpreter, he determines that the deceased was a victim of foul play instead of an accident.
episodes.title: The Mole

episodes.synopsis: Megan turns to Charlie for help to find a pattern in recent freeway shootings. However, when more attacks occur, it's Don who finds a valuable clue.
episodes.title: Traffic

episodes.synopsis: As Charlie investigates a suspicious death at a racetrack, he discovers the murder was part of a larger crime linked to a third party.
episodes.title: Longshot

episodes.synopsis: Don's team tries to determine if the recent wave of blackouts plaguing Los Angeles is accidental or the work of terrorists.
episodes.title: Blackout

episodes.synopsis: The FBI uses a fantasy baseball enthusiast's statistical model in their investigation of the death of a minor league player.
episodes.title: Hardball

episodes.synopsis: When toxic waste containers are found buried underneath a school's playground, the team tries to link the containers to a construction company.
episodes.title: Waste Not

episodes.synopsis: Don's investigation of a senator's death leads to a surprising revelation about a behavior modification project that was sponsored by the government.
episodes.title: Brutus

episodes.synopsis: While Don searches for a serial killer that targets teenage girls online, Charlie deals with Larry's departure for the NASA space shuttle mission.
episodes.title: Killer Chat

episodes.synopsis: In their effort to track down the leader of a religious cult, Charlie and Amita work to decipher a chart found where the leader was seen last.
episodes.title: Nine Wives

episodes.synopsis: Charlie is asked by both Don and the NSA to investigate two cases related to the sinking of a multimillion-dollar racing yacht.
episodes.title: Finders Keepers

episodes.synopsis: The team investigates a group involved in theft, fraud and money laundering. Meanwhile, Don deals with the aftermath of the Crystal Hoyle case.
episodes.title: Take Out

episodes.synopsis: Charlie's analysis prompts the FBI to investigate alternate theories regarding a recently reopened cold case involving a missing police officer.
episodes.title: End of Watch

episodes.synopsis: Despite the overwhelming evidence against him, David tries to prove his friend's innocence after he becomes the target of an FBI investigation.
episodes.title: Contenders

episodes.synopsis: Charlie and the team have just one hour to save the kidnapped son of a famous music mogul with a long list of enemies.
episodes.title: One Hour

episodes.synopsis: Don and his team try to determine who stands to gain from a series of murders tied to a vast conspiracy of voter fraud.
episodes.title: Democracy

episodes.synopsis: The FBI suspects that a plane crash was engineered in an attempt to steal a jet engine prototype, but Charlie's tests suggest a different motive.
episodes.title: Pandora's Box

episodes.synopsis: Don and Charlie investigate a series of letter bombings that look like the work of an old suspect who escaped conviction.
episodes.title: Burn Rate

episodes.synopsis: Don is suspicious about a killer's eagerness to disclose the location of several buried bodies. Meanwhile, Larry completes his space mission.
episodes.title: The Art of Reckoning

episodes.synopsis: Don and Charlie discover that a very different kind of organization may be the real mastermind behind a plot to attack Los Angeles's water supply.
episodes.title: Under Pressure

episodes.synopsis: As Charlie maps out a hijacked relief truck's likely escape route, a second crew of thieves goes after the goods.
episodes.title: Money for Nothing

episodes.synopsis: While Charlie analyzes the codes of a former spy who's compiled a long list of traitors, a deeply guarded secret within Don's team is exposed.
episodes.title: The Janus List

episodes.synopsis: Don and his team attempt to capture an escaped agent who was recently exposed as a mole inside the FBI.
episodes.title: Trust Metric

episodes.synopsis: When a woman is found murdered inside the estate of a celebrated young actor, the team follows a trail of clues that point to a blackmail scheme.
episodes.title: Hollywood Homicide

episodes.synopsis: When a car plows into the side of a crowded café, the team investigates a possible connection between the accident and an earlier incident.
episodes.title: Velocity

episodes.synopsis: The team analyzes numerological patterns in the Bible to track down a serial killer who is replicating the deaths of the 12 apostles.
episodes.title: Thirteen

episodes.synopsis: Don and Charlie attempt to find an ulterior motive behind a surprisingly generous thief's charitable deeds.
episodes.title: Robin Hood

episodes.synopsis: A distraught Agent Don Eppes believes he inadvertently led a killer to the home of a murdered woman in the witness protection program.
episodes.title: In Security

episodes.synopsis: A player of Primacy -- an online and offline role-playing game -- plants clues in the game that have lethal consequences in the real world.
episodes.title: Primacy

episodes.synopsis: Megan is shocked when a rich tycoon refuses to negotiate with his daughter's kidnappers. Meanwhile, Don and Charlie attempt to recover the girl.
episodes.title: Tabu

episodes.synopsis: Charlie teams up with a comic book expert when counterfeit copies of a rare, stolen comic book hit the streets.
episodes.title: Graphic

episodes.synopsis: Don assembles a rescue team when ex-FBI subcontractor Ben Blakely guns down an agent and takes David hostage.
episodes.title: Chinese Box

episodes.synopsis: Charlie is brought in to assist with the case of a missing journalist. But the kidnappers try to intimidate Charlie, hoping to force him off the case.
episodes.title: Breaking Point

episodes.synopsis: Don and his brother, Charlie, must work together to track down and bring to justice a corrupt police officer who's committing a series of rapes.
episodes.title: Power

episodes.synopsis: When the team shuts down an inner-city meth lab, they uncover a link to a group of American terrorists plotting to blow up a bank building.
episodes.title: Black Swan

episodes.synopsis: Don and Charlie try to keep Don's ex, Robin, from becoming the latest victim in a string of murders tied to her criminal case.
episodes.title: Checkmate

episodes.synopsis: Agent Don Eppes and his team try to track down a group of kidnappers and their hostages, as well as the hostages' would-be rescuer.
episodes.title: End Game

episodes.synopsis: A complicated murder plot emerges when Don and Charlie investigate a mass poisoning at the compound of a religious cult.
episodes.title: Atomic No. 33

episodes.synopsis: The team discovers that the murder of a hip-hop star may be linked to a larger conspiracy.
episodes.title: Pay to Play

episodes.synopsis: Charlie works to prove the innocence of a friend accused of terrorist activities, and clashes with Don over issues of national security.
episodes.title: When Worlds Collide

episodes.synopsis: Don and his team investigate a homicide involving two deceased rock climbers and a diamond, and a new face joins the team.
episodes.title: High Exposure

episodes.synopsis: A killer forces a woman to withdraw money from an ATM and then murders her. The team looks for patterns in a recent rash of ATM kidnappings.
episodes.title: Decoy Effect

episodes.synopsis: A detective looks to Don for help when eight people are gunned down in a coffee shop. McGowan continues his investigation of Don and Charlie.
episodes.title: Blowback

episodes.synopsis: A seasoned FBI agent enlists the team's help in tracking down a con man. But without a name or face, they've got their work cut out for them.
episodes.title: Jack of All Trades

episodes.synopsis: The team enlists the help of a company employee whose mathematical mind may hold the key to solving the crime of stolen goods.
episodes.title: Scan Man

episodes.synopsis: Don and his team investigate when an illusionist vanishes during his show -- and doesn't come back.
episodes.title: Magic Show

episodes.synopsis: Don and Charlie investigate the death of a surfer near the Channel Islands and uncover a surprising link to another case.
episodes.title: Charlie Don't Surf

episodes.synopsis: Don and Charlie must figure out how to rescue the survivors from the wreckage of a train transporting dangerous chemicals.
episodes.title: Thirty-Six Hours

episodes.synopsis: When a bombing wipes out the headquarters of a powerful charity, Don and his team look into the organization's allies as well as its critics.
episodes.title: Conspiracy Theory

episodes.synopsis: Charlie must put his ego aside when his archrival, mathematician Marshall Penfield, is called in to help the team track down a killer.
episodes.title: Frienemies

episodes.synopsis: A teenage killer who went on a brutal crime spree breaks out of jail and vows to exact revenge on Don, the man who put him behind bars.
episodes.title: Arrow of Time

episodes.synopsis: The team has only four hours to rescue 18 hostages aboard a hijacked Hollywood tour bus. Question is -- can Charlie really hack a bus?
episodes.title: Jacked

episodes.synopsis: Psychic Samuel Kraft returns to help the team track down a missing FBI agent -- and a series of bodies -- in Chinatown's black market.
episodes.title: Trouble in Chinatown

episodes.synopsis: Don and the team get their first taste of underground sneaker culture when burglars steal an Ambassador's $250,000 pair of shoes.
episodes.title: Sneakerhead

episodes.synopsis: An airtight case against an arms smuggler ends in an acquittal. Don and Charlie run the numbers on the probability of jury tampering.
episodes.title: Guilt Trip

episodes.synopsis: A new drug called Hawaiian Ice is about to hit the streets and Liz goes undercover only to find herself in a very precarious position.
episodes.title: Cover Me

episodes.synopsis: When a scientist is killed, the team interrogates an attractive supercomputer named Baley who seems to have a mind of her own.
episodes.title: First Law

episodes.synopsis: The FBI receives information that could free a mob boss. Charlie uses his math skills to help the losing CalSci basketball team.
episodes.title: 12:01 AM

episodes.synopsis: When a Cal Sci professor winds up dead, the No. 1 suspect turns out to belong to an animal rights group with a lethal agenda.
episodes.title: Animal Rites

episodes.synopsis: Charlie's calculations predict the next home invasion target, but Don is injured when he's attacked during the FBI's raid.
episodes.title: The Fifth Man

episodes.synopsis: Wracked by guilt over his mistake, Charlie channels his energy into tracking a serial killer who's gone under the radar.
episodes.title: Disturbed

episodes.synopsis: The team's number-one suspect in a string of copycat bank robberies is none other than corrupt former fed Jack Bloom.
episodes.title: Greatest Hits

episodes.synopsis: Amita is abducted by a sociopath. As Charlie searches for a motive, the team scrambles to locate Amita before her number's up.
episodes.title: Angels and Devils

episodes.synopsis: Don and the team must protect a high-profile activist from an assassin. Elsewhere, Charlie awaits an answer from Amita about his marriage proposal.
episodes.title: Hangman

episodes.synopsis: When two FBI agents are killed during a shootout with bank robbers, the team must investigate what exactly happened.
episodes.title: Friendly Fire

episodes.synopsis: Don and his team are called in to investigate who is behind a deadly gambling ring.
episodes.title: 7 Men Out

episodes.synopsis: The team investigates a series of murders that are being copied from scenes out of an upcoming movie. Larry leaves to embark on a personal adventure.
episodes.title: Where Credit's Due

episodes.synopsis: The team searches for a geneticist's daughter they suspect was taken by her mother, and become more concerned when they think the girl may be a clone.
episodes.title: Hydra

episodes.synopsis: Strange, almost paranormal happenings occur at a decommissioned air base, and the team is brought in to investigate the mystery of a dead woman.
episodes.title: Dreamland

episodes.synopsis: The team's undercover sting to locate a cyber crime lord is foiled by a brilliant hacker intent on taking over online black markets.
episodes.title: Shadow Markets

episodes.synopsis: When the informant he meets with ends up dead, Agent Edgerton goes over the edge and takes a member of Don's team hostage.
episodes.title: Ultimatum

episodes.synopsis: When copycat robbers hit a diamond exchange and take hostages, Don and the team find an unlikely ally in convict John Buckley.
episodes.title: Con Job

episodes.synopsis: The team calls on agent Roger Bloom for help with the investigation of an armored car robbery that traces back to the infamous D.B. Cooper heist.
episodes.title: Old Soldiers

episodes.synopsis: The team investigates the theft of lottery tickets, and learns that one of the culprits killed in a botched robbery is a former lottery winner.
episodes.title: Scratch

episodes.synopsis: The team searches for a shipment of firearms responsible for random killings throughout the city. Also, Charlie and Amita disagree on a wedding date.
episodes.title: Arm In Arms

episodes.synopsis: The team searches for a serial killer targeting men who solicit prostitutes. Meanwhile, Colby and Nikki deal with the aftermath of a car accident.
episodes.title: Devil Girl

episodes.synopsis: The team gets a taste of the limelight when they search for jewels worth millions that have been stolen during an awards show broadcast.
episodes.title: And The Winner Is..

episodes.synopsis: The team investigates the deaths of two men who were part of a group of friends that had been sexually assaulted by a teacher when they were young.
episodes.title: Growin' Up

episodes.synopsis: After Charlie and Amita get married and begin preparations for their London adventure, they help Don track down the whereabouts of his gun.
episodes.title: Cause and Effect
